annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 7
annotations.translation: 第 7 条

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (e) all rights in any work done by a SNE in the performance of his duties shall be the property of the GSC;
annotations.translation: (e) SNE 在履行职责时完成的任何工作的所有权均归 GSC 所有；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (f) a SNE shall reside at the place of secondment or at no greater distance therefrom as is compatible with the proper performance of his activities;
annotations.translation: (f) SNE 应居住在借调地或与借调地相距不超过适当开展活动所需的距离；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (g) a SNE shall assist and tender advice to the superior to whom he is assigned and shall be responsible to superior for the performance of the tasks entrusted to him;
annotations.translation: (g) SNE 应协助并向受指派的上级提供招标意见，并就受委托的任务对上级负责；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (h) a SNE shall, in the exercise of his duties, accept no instructions from his employer or national government. He shall not undertake any activities for his employer, nor for governments, nor for any other person, private company or public body.
annotations.translation: (h) SNE 在履行职责时不得接受其雇主或国家政府的任何指示。他不得为其雇主、政府或任何其他人、私营公司或公共机构从事任何活动。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. Both during and after the period of secondment, a SNE shall exercise the greatest discretion with regard to all facts and information coming to his knowledge in the course of or in connection with the performance of his duties. He shall not in any form whatsoever disclose to any unauthorised person any document or information not already lawfully made public, nor shall he use it for personal gain.
annotations.translation: 2. 无论在借调期间还是借调之后，SNE 都应至为慎重地对待履行职责过程中或与履行职责有关的过程中了解到的所有事实和信息，不得以任何形式向未经授权的人披露尚未合法公开的文件或信息，也不得用于谋取私利。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. At the end of the secondment a SNE shall continue to be bound by the obligation to act with integrity and discretion in the exercise of new duties assigned to him and in accepting certain posts or advantages.
annotations.translation: 3. 在借调结束时，SNE 仍有义务在行使分配给他的新职责和接受某些职位或好处时保持诚信，谨慎行事。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: To that end, in the three years following the period of secondment a SNE shall inform the GSC forthwith of any duties or tasks he has to perform for his employer which are likely to give rise to a conflict of interest in relation to the tasks he carried out during secondment.
annotations.translation: 为此目的，在借调期之后的三年内，SNE 应立即通知 GSC，说明他必须为其雇主履行的任何职责或任务，这些职责或任务可能与其借调期间履行的任务产生利益冲突。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 4. A SNE shall be subject to the security rules in force in the GSC
annotations.translation: 4. SNE 应受到 GSC 现行安全规则的约束

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 5. Failure to comply with the provisions of this Article during the period of secondment shall entitle the GSC to terminate the secondment of a SNE under the terms of Article 8.
annotations.translation: 5. 在借调期间不遵守本条规定的，GSC 有权根据第 8 条的规定终止借调。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 6
annotations.translation: 第 6 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Level, professional experience and knowledge of languages
annotations.translation: 语言水平、专业经验和知识

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. To qualify for secondment to the GSC a SNE must have at least three years' full-time experience of administrative, scientific, technical, advisory or supervisory functions equivalent to those of category A or B as defined in the Staff Regulations of officials of the European Communities and the Conditions of employment applicable to other servants of the Communities. Before the secondment, the SNE's employer shall supply the GSC with a statement of the expert's employment covering the previous 12 months.
annotations.translation: 1. 要获得借调到 GSC 的资格，SNE 必须具有至少三年的行政、科学、技术、咨询或监督工作的全职经验，相当于欧洲共同体官员《工作人员条例》和适用于共同体其他公务员的就业条件中定义的 A 类或 B 类工作。在借调之前，SNE 的雇主应向 GSC 提供该专家过去 12 个月的工作情况说明。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. A SNE must have a thorough knowledge of one Community language and a satisfactory knowledge of a second language for the performance of his duties.
annotations.translation: 2. SNE 必须精通一种共同体语言，并对第二种语言具有令人满意的了解程度，以履行其职责。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Suspension of secondment
annotations.translation: 暂停借调

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. The GSC may authorise suspensions of secondment and specify the terms applicable. During such suspensions:
annotations.translation: 1. GSC 可授权暂停借调并具体规定适用的条款。在此类暂停期间：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) the allowances referred to in Articles 15 and 16 shall not be payable;
annotations.translation: (a) 不支付第 15 条和第 16 条所述的津贴；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) the expenses referred to in Articles 18 and 19 shall be payable only if the suspension is at the GSC's request.
annotations.translation: (b) 只有在应 GSC 的要求暂停时，才能支付第 18 条和第 19 条所述的费用。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. The GSC shall inform the SNE's employer.
annotations.translation: 2. GSC 应通知 SNE 的雇主。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 8
annotations.translation: 第 8 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Termination of periods of secondment
annotations.translation: 借调期的终止

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. Subject to paragraph 2, secondment may be terminated at the request of GSC or of the SNE's employer, provided three months' notice is given. It may also be terminated at the SNE's request provided the same notice is given and subject to the GSC's agreement.
annotations.translation: 1. 据第 2 段的规定，可应 GSC 或 SNE 雇主的要求终止借调，但须提前三个月通知，也可应 SNE 的要求终止借调，但同样须提前三个月通知，并须征得 GSC 的同意。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. In certain exceptional circumstances the secondment may be terminated without notice:
annotations.translation: 2. 在某些特殊情况下，借调可能会终止，而不另行通知：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) by the SNE's employer, if the employer's essential interests so require,
annotations.translation: (a) 由 SNE 的雇主决定，如果雇主的基本利益有此需要，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) by agreement between the GSC and the employer, at the request of the SNE to both parties, if the SNE's essential personal or professional interests so require,
annotations.translation: (b) 根据 GSC 与雇主之间的协议，应 SNE 向双方提出的要求，如果 SNE 的基本个人或专业利益有此需要，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) by the GSC in the event of failure by the SNE to comply with his obligations under these rules. The SNE shall first be given an opportunity to submit his defence.
annotations.translation: (c) 如果 SNE 未能遵守这些规则规定的义务，则由 GSC 决定。SNE 应首先有机会提出辩护。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. In the event of termination under paragraph 2(c), the GSC shall immediately inform the employer.
annotations.translation: 3. 如果根据第 2(c) 条终止，GSC 应立即通知雇主。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: CHAPTER II
annotations.translation: 第二章

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: WORKING CONDITIONS
annotations.translation: 工作条件

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 9
annotations.translation: 第 9 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Social security
annotations.translation: 社会保障

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. Before the period of secondment begins, the employer from which the national expert is to be seconded shall certify to the GSC that, throughout the period of secondment, the SNE will remain subject to the social security legislation applicable to the public administration or international organisation which employs the SNE and which will assume responsibility for expenses incurred abroad.
annotations.translation: 1. 在借调期开始之前，拟借调本国专家的雇主应向 GSC 证明，在整个借调期内，SNE 仍受适用于雇用 SNE 的公共行政机构或国际组织的社会保障法规的约束，该公共行政机构或国际组织将负责支付在国外发生的费用。
